mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_KIND , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_GEN , MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADD , MEM_ADDR , MEM_CVS_NAME , MEM_CVS_TEL , MEM_INTRO , MEM_X , MEM_Y ) VALUES ( #{mem_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{mem_pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mem_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) -- , #{mem_kind, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_gen, jdbcType=CHAR} -- , #{mem_zip, jdbcType=NUMERIC} -- , #{mem_add, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_cvs_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_cvs_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- , #{mem_x, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=String} -- , #{mem_y, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=String} -- )
mapper.select: SELECT CRYPTPACK.DECRYPT(mem_pw, #{mem_id}) as mem_pw , MEM_ID , MEM_KIND , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_GEN , MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADD , MEM_ADDR , MEM_CVS_NAME , MEM_CVS_TEL , MEM_INTRO , MEM_X , MEM_Y FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_CVS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{mem_cvs_name}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_KIND , MEM_NAME , MEM_TEL , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_GEN , MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADD , MEM_ADDR , MEM_CVS_NAME , MEM_CVS_TEL , MEM_INTRO , TO_CHAR(MEM_X) MEM_X , TO_CHAR(MEM_Y) MEM_Y FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND MEM_KIND = '01' AND MEM_CVS_NAME like '%${mem_cvs_name}%' ORDER BY MEM_CVS_NAME ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE MEM_CVS_NAME like '%'||#{mem_cvs_name}||'%'

SELECT M.MEM_ID -- 사업자번호 ,M.MEM_NAME -- 업주명 ,M.MEM_TEL -- 업주전화번호 ,M.MEM_BIRTH -- 업주 생년월일 ,M.MEM_GEN -- 업주 성별 ,M.MEM_ZIP -- 매장 우편번호 ,M.MEM_ADD -- 매장 구주소 ,M.MEM_ADDR -- 매장 신주소 ,M.MEM_CVS_NAME -- 매장명 ,M.MEM_CVS_TEL -- 매장번호 ,M.MEM_INTRO -- 매장소개 ,M.MEM_X -- 매장X좌표 ,M.MEM_Y -- 매장Y좌표 ,SL.STCKLIST_ID -- 재고리스트코드 ,SL.STCKLIST_AMOUNT -- 수량 ,SL.SICKLIST_EXDATE -- 유통기한 ,SL.STCK_DATE -- 날짜 ,SL.STCKLIST_INFO -- 비고 ,F.FILE_UPNAME -- 파일업로드명 ,F.FILE_PATH -- 파일경로 ,F.FILE_DOT -- 파일확장자
FROM MEMBER M -- 회원테이블 JOIN STOCK S -- 재고테이블 ON M.MEM_ID = S.MEM_ID JOIN STOCK_LIST SL -- 재고리스트테이블 ON S.STOCK_ID = SL.STOCK_ID JOIN FILEdATA F -- 자료테이블 ON M.MEM_ID = F.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(SL.STCK_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') -- 현재날짜 AND SL.STCKLIST_KIND = '888' -- 재고 AND SL.STCKLIST_AMOUNT > 0 -- 재고1이상 AND M.MEM_KIND = '01' -- 편의점 AND SL.PROD_ID = #{prod_id} -- 제품코드
